_header: Men them complains of untruth / law is dead and that is ruth
_description: On the degeneracy of the times — in couplets

BodHat107.Transcription:
[ ]pleyes of vntrewythla[ ]dede and þat es rewthtrechery of
                    al aboueand grauen he as trew louf
BodHat107.Note: 7 lines; partly unreadable and ends imperfectly.
